title: Chapter 1816 - Chapter 1816: You Dare To Touch Me?
body:
Chapter 1816 - Chapter 1816: You Dare To Touch Me?

Chapter 1816: You dare to touch me?

Translator: 549690339

During the collision with the Falcon just now, Lu Ming had secretly cast the volume of seal. At this time, the power was so shocking that the Falcon could not even circulate his cultivation.

...

“No, Lu Ming, you can’t kill me …”

Falcon shouted in horror.

“Ridiculous, kill!’1

Lu Ming pointed his finger and the chaos finger of tribulation was formed, crushing Falcon.

Falcon had been scaled and could not exert much of his strength. It was impossible for him to resist. He was crushed by the finger of chaotic tribulation and slammed heavily into the wall of the valley. The wall exploded continuously. In the end, Lu Ming blasted another Valley out. Falcon had boon torn into pieces and his soul had been destroyed.

He had never thought that the number one genius of the Tianqin Palace would die Here.

He had been invited by Wan Zhengyang to kill the Phoenix Spirit, and he agreed without hesitation. He had been coveting the Phoenix Spirit for a long time.

He had thought that with his cultivation, together with Wan Zhengyang and the others, it would be a piece of cake to deal with Feng Ling.

He had never expected to run into Lu Ming here. Furthermore, Lu Ming’s combat strength had reached a terrifying level that he could actually kill him.

“Wan Zhengyang, you can’t escape!”

Lu Ming’s gaze was extremely cold as he looked in the direction Wan Zhengyang had fled.

“Brother Lu Ming, leave it to me!”

The bubble appeared on Lu Ming’s shoulder. It controlled the space-time law and enveloped Lu Ming’s entire body.

Buzzzzzz!

Lu Ming’s body moved and he disappeared from his original spot. He chased after Wan Zhengyang at a terrifying speed.

Wherever Lu Ming passed, the space would ripple. It was as if Lu Ming was traveling through the void at an extremely fast speed.

Not long after, he saw a few figures flying at high speed ahead.

However, they did not sec Wan Zhengyang. It was obvious that Wan Zhengyang was the fastest and had already left the others behind.

Seeing that Lu Ming was chasing after them, they were scared out of their wits. Seeing that they could not escape, they gritted their teeth and attacked Lu Ming, wanting to fight to the death.

However, the result was already set in stone. Lu Ming went on a killing spree and killed all of them in a few moves.

“Brother Lu Ming, it s in that direction!”

Bubbles pointed to the right.

Bubbles could sense the situation far away through space. As long as they were not too far away, Wan Zhengyang would not be able to escape.

Lu Ming moved and flew to the right.

soon, soon. There’s a mine of the WAN family not far ahead. There arc Emperor-ranked experts guarding it. As long as I escape there, I’ll be fine!

“I hope those trash can hold on for a while longer!”

let’s go! Wan Zhengyang increased his speed to the maximum and flew toward a mountain range.

The WAN family needed too many weapons to cultivate the ten thousand soldiers scroll. Therefore, the WAN family would do everything they could to obtain weapons.

For example, he had set up the ten thousand spirit exchange and various Chamber of Commerces. He traveled around the world mainly to earn orirocks and buy all sorts of weapons.

He would also open up all kinds of mines and make all kinds of weapons.

In the ancient Moon Holy Land, the WAN family had many mines. Near the ten thousand flame mountain, there was a large mine that unearthed precious forging materials, and there were Emperor level figures guarding it.

Wan Zhengyang was going to the mine to seek shelter.

Not long after, a large mine appeared in front of them. Wan Zhengyang’s eyes lit up.

“Lu Ming, I will kill you one day!”

Wan Zhengyang’s eyes glowed with malice.

However, at this moment, his expression changed. A terrifying fluctuation came from behind him. A figure was chasing after him at an incredible speed.

“Lu Ming, why are you so fast? run, run, run!”

Wan Zhengyang was almost scared to death. Lu Ming’s pursuit meant that the Falcon was in grave danger. Naturally, he was afraid. He burst out with all his strength and flew toward the large mine with all his might.

He was getting closer and closer to the mine, but Lu Ming’s figure was also rapidly approaching. He was not far away.

“Save me, forefather, save me!”

Wan Zhengyang roared madly. His voice was pushed by the Saint power, and it was much faster than his flying speed. It traveled far and wide.

In the mine, many mining and smelting workers raised their heads and looked at Wan Zhengyang.

that’s WAN Zhengyang, the number one heaven’s favorite of the WAN clan!

“He’s running for his life, who wants to kill him?”

Many people speculated as they looked behind Wan Zhengyang.

“Patriarch, save me! Lu Ming wants to kill me…”

Wan Zhengyang roared again, shocking many people.

Lu Ming, it was actually Lu Ming.

Lu Ming wanted to kill Wan Zhengyang and had even chased him all the way here.

Lu Ming’s name had spread throughout the entire ancient Moon Holy Land. Many people had not seen Lu Ming before, but they had heard of him.

“You can’t escape!”

Lu Ming’s eyes were cold as he rapidly approached Wan Zhengyang.

At this moment, the bubble opened its mouth and a transparent bubble flow out. Then, a transparent bubble suddenly appeared around Wan Zhengyang’s body and trapped him. Wan Zhengyang’s body stopped moving.

“Not good!”

Wan Zhengyang’s expression changed. He tried to break through, but he couldn’t.

“Suppress!”

Lu Ming’s glabella glowed, and the Tai Chi formation plate appeared. It expanded rapidly and pressed down on Wan Zhengyang.

Wan Zhengyang’s body trembled as he was continuously suppressed by the laws of space and time and the Tai Chi formation disk. He was almost unable to move.

BOOM!

At this moment, a shocking aura burst out from the WAN family’s mine. A beam of light shot into the sky, and a terrifying pressure filled the air, causing everyone’s expression to change.

That was Emperor pressure!

A figure appeared in the light, and a rumbling voice came from all directions,” “Lu Ming, how dare you kill the WAN clan’s prodigy?”

“Emperor-level great ancestor, haha, it’s an Emperor-level great ancestor!”

Wan Zhengyang was overjoyed. A monarch-level expert had appeared. His life could be considered saved.

But the next moment, his pupils rapidly contracted.

This was because Lu Ming did not stop at all. He appeared next to him and threw a punch, A storm-like force surged toward Wan Zhengyang. Under the double suppression of the bubbles and the Tai Chi disk array, Wan Zhengyang could hardly resist.

The terrifying power entered Wan Zhengyang’s body, causing him to spit out a mouthful of blood. His bones and armor were all shattered, and even his Saint heart in his dantian was cracked.

Wan Zhengyang was severely injured, and his aura was weak.

Lu Ming grabbed Wan Zhengyang’s neck and stood proudly in the void.

There was a flash of light, and in the next moment, an old man appeared in front of Lu Ming. His aura was earth-shattering, as if he was a king who ruled the world.

This was a monarch-level expert from the WAN clan.

“Forefather, save me!”

Wan Zhengyang roared.

“Lu Ming, let Zhengyang go. Otherwise, I’ll make you face a life-and-death situation!”

The Emperor-level expert from the WAN clan coldly spoke.

Lu Ming was simply too bold. He had appeared just now and Lu Ming still dared to attack Wan Zhengyang and severely injure him.

“You’re making me face a life and death dilemma? He he he!”

Lu Ming sneered and looked at the Emperor-level powerhouse of the WAN family in disdain/You dare to touch me?”

These words caused the WAN clan s Emperor level expert’s face to change..
